screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .ttxfolder file in Apple TextEdit
screenshot.caption: TTXFOLDER file open in Apple TextEdit

description: Autosync and its variants, including OneSync and Dropsync, are Android apps that allow users to synchronize the files on their device with a cloud storage service. For example, users can use Autosync to synchronize their data with Google Drive, OneDrive, and Dropbox.

When Autosync synchronizes a folder with a cloud storage service, it creates a hidden TTXFOLDER file inside that folder. This file notes the folder's Autosync ID and the time at which the folder was linked to an associated folder in a cloud storage service.

common_filenames.description: .ttxfolder - The filename assigned to all TTXFOLDER files.
